articles.author: Tarkesh Jha
articles.title: India vs Pakistan cricket rivalry: Most controversial moments from matches between the Asian arch-rivals - CNBCTV18
articles.description: There has been no shortage of drama, excitement, and action whenever India and Pakistan have squared off in any encounter. Will we see more drama in New York on Sunday? Check heated moments between the Asian arch-rivals from the past as they face-off on June …
articles.content: The stage is set for a high-octance match in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024 between India and Pakistan at the Nassau County International Stadium in New York on June 9. The Men in Blue secured a co… [+3225 chars]
